item.title: Mongoose Connection
item.description: Connect to Mongoose Database const mongoose = require('mongoose'); const db = mongoose.connection; mongoose.connect("mongodb://localhost:27017/appname"); db.on('open', () => { console.log('Connected to mongoDB'); }); db.on('error', (error) => { console.log(error); });

item.title: Mongoose Schema
item.description: Mongoose Schema Basic Schema const mongoose = require('mongoose'); const Schema = mongoose.Schema; const userSchema = new Schema({ name: { type: String, required: true, max: 100 }, email: { type: String, required: false, max: 100, default: null }, }); module.exports = mongoose.model('user', userSchema);
